flavorText: Swimming in coins proved harder than they'd hoped, but dancing was a jingling delight.

foreignData.flavorText: Es ließ sich nicht so gut wie erhofft in den Goldmünzen schwimmen. Aber darauf zu tanzen, war ein Vergnügen.
foreignData.name: Erstürmung der Schatzkammer // Schatzkammer von Catlacan
foreignData.text:
(Transformierte Erstürmung der Schatzkammer.)
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, um {U}.

foreignData.flavorText: Nadar entre monedas resultó más difícil de lo que creían, pero bailar sobre ellas les aportó un tintineante placer.
foreignData.name: Asaltar la bóveda del tesoro // Bóveda del tesoro de Catlacán
foreignData.text:
(Se transforma de Asaltar la bóveda del tesoro.)
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná.
{T}: Agrega {U} a tu reserva de maná por cada artefacto que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: Nager dans les pièces d'or fut plus difficile qu'ils ne l'avaient espéré, mais danser provoqua un délicieux tintement métallique.
foreignData.name: Assaut du caveau // Caveau de Catlacan
foreignData.text:
(Transformation de l'Assaut du caveau.)
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} à votre réserve pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: Nuotare nell'oro si rivelò più difficile di quanto avessero sperato, ma danzarci sopra fu una gioia tintinnante.
foreignData.name: Assaltare la Sala del Tesoro // Sala del Tesoro di Catlacan
foreignData.text:
(Si trasforma da Assaltare la Sala del Tesoro.)
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} alla tua riserva di mana per ogni artefatto che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 一杯のコインの中を動き回るのは思ったよりも困難だったが、踊るのは楽しかった。
foreignData.name: 宝物庫襲撃 // カトラカンの宝物庫
foreignData.text:
（宝物庫襲撃から変身する。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクト１つにつき{U}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 동전 속에서 춤추는 것은 생각했던 것보다 힘들다는 것이 밝혀졌지만, 춤출 때마다 딸랑거리는 소리는 귀를 즐겁게 했다.
foreignData.name: 저장고 습격 // 카틀라칸의 저장고
foreignData.text:
(저장고 습격에서 변신함.)
{T}: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다.
{T}: 당신이 조종하는 마법물체 한 개당 {U}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Nadar nas moedas foi mais difícil do que eles esperavam, mas dançar foi uma tilintante delícia.

{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana.
{T}: Adicione {U} à sua reserva de mana para cada artefato que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: Купаться в монетах оказалось труднее, чем они надеялись, зато танцы доставляли несказанное, звенящее наслаждение.

foreignData.text:
(Трансформируется из Штурма Сокровищницы.)

{T}: добавьте {U} в ваше хранилище маны за каждый артефакт под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 畅游金币海洋比想象更难，但舞动其间确有当啷乐趣。

foreignData.flavorText: 暢遊金幣海洋比想像更難，但舞動其間確有噹啷樂趣。

name: Storm the Vault // Vault of Catlacan
originalText:
(Transforms from Storm the Vault.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool for each artifact you control.

rulings.text: Storm the Vault’s first ability can trigger more than once in a turn if creatures you control deal combat damage at different times in a turn (most likely because one or more has first strike) or if creatures you control deal combat damage to more than one player at once.

The last ability of Storm the Vault doesn’t trigger if you don’t control five or more artifacts as your end step begins. If it does trigger but you don’t control five or more artifacts as it resolves, it does nothing.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, if you control more than one creature that can attack, you attack different opponents so that Storm the Vault’s first ability triggers twice.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

text:
(Transforms from Storm the Vault.)
